usage: This word attaches as a prefix to the word.
example: The Heavens is הַשָּׁמַיִם with הַ (ha) being the prefix to שָּׁמַיִם (shuh-mah-yeem) to make הַשָּׁמַיִם (ha-shuh-mah-yeem)

usage: This word attaches as a prefix to the word.
example: And darkness is וְהֹשֶׁךְ (vuh-ho-shekh), just one word.

usage: These four letters together are known as the Tetragrammaton or the Tetragram and are designed to be more of a inhale and exhale.
